message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which is valued at $1,200,000 to you. I understand the importance of this investment to you and would like to extend an exclusive offer. For a limited time only, I am willing to sell this product to you at a special introductory price of $1,100,000. This is an exceptional chance to secure such a valuable asset at a reduced cost. Please let me know if you are interested in discussing this further.
